Title: Colophon
Medium: ink and pigments on European laid paper
Inscriptions: [Transliteration] harrarahu al-faqīr al-haqī Muhammad ibn Muhammad /1/ Shākir Rūzmah-'i Nāthānī /2/ ghaffara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-li-wālidayy [sic] /3/ wa-ahsana ilayhimā wa-ilahi /4/ sanah 1121 /5/ fī 12 n (=Ramadān)
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.659 contains a colophon written in Arabic, giving the name of the scribe and the date of copying.
Keywords: Islamic; Ottoman; Turkish; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Turkey; Cosmology; Astrology; Science -- Medicine
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Zakariya ibn Muhammad Qazwini (ca. 1203-1283)
